wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Bezra Nicol (died 1834 or after) was a British actress who became known for playing older women character roles in Edinburgh.

response: * Probable date – Sarah Bezra Nicol, actress (born in England)

In 1800 Emma Nicol was born, she was the first of four daughters of Sarah Bezra Nicol and her husband who were to become actresses.J. Gilliland, ‘Nicol, Sarah Bezra (d. in or after 1834)’, Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, 2004; online edn, May 2007 accessed 8 Feb 2015
